welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grover Beach, the charming seaside city known for its beautiful coastline and relaxed atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Luis County Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at San Luis County Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Public Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
